contents.item: It is hard work and great art to make life not so serious.
contents.owner: John Irving, The Hotel New Hampshire

contents.item: Art is the reason I get up in the morning, but the definition ends there. It doesn't seem fair that I'm living for something I can't even define.
I don’t want life to imitate art. I want life to be art.
Self-consciousness is the enemy of all art, be it acting, writing, painting, or living itself, which is the greatest art of all.
In the haunted house of life, art is the only stair that doesn't creak.
Bring something incomprehensible into the world!
contents.owner: Gilles Deleuze, A Thousand Plateaus: Capitalism and Schizophrenia

contents.item: Vital lives are about action. You can't feel warmth unless you create it, can't feel delight until you play, can't know serendipity unless you risk.
I am my own experiment. I am my own work of art.
Art and life are subjective. Not everybody's gonna dig what I dig, but I reserve the right to dig it.
I think there is a song out there to describe just about any situation.
All art is but dirtying the paper delicately.
contents.owner: John Ruskin, The Elements of Drawing

contents.item: Be curious about the world in which you live. Look things up. Chase down every reference. Go deeper than anybody else--that's how you'll get ahead.
contents.owner: Austin Kleon, Steal Like an Artist: 10 Things Nobody Told You About Being Creative

contents.item: The preparation of good food is merely another expression of art, one of the joys of civilized living…
A painter should begin every canvas with a wash of black, because all things in nature are dark except where exposed by the light.
We don't make mistakes, just happy little accidents.
I don't paint dreams or nightmares, I paint my own reality.
Love art in yourself, and not yourself in art.
contents.owner: Konstantin Stanislavski, My Life In Art

contents.item: Every morning when I wake up, I experience an exquisite joy —the joy of being Salvador Dalí— and I ask myself in rapture: What wonderful things is this Salvador Dalí going to accomplish today?
An idea is salvation by imagination
A photographer is like a cod, which produces a million eggs in order that one may reach maturity.
